subtitle: Fondues are simple and quick to prepare - perfect for suppers, buffet parties, barbecues and informal entertaining alike.

method.text: Rub the inside of a fondue pot with the garlic. Leave the garlic in the bottom of the pot. Pour in the wine and lemon juice. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer.
Gradually add the cheese, stirring constantly until all the cheese is added and melted.
Blend the cornflour with the Kirsch and mustard. Stir into the fondue. Cook gently for 3-4 min until the mixture becomes smooth and thick.
Season to taste with the nutmeg and white pepper.
Carefully transfer the fondue pan to the lighted spirit stove and serve immediately.

title: Swiss cheese fondue
